subject: Don't waste your time. Cheap pills are here.
body:
Dear customer.
CanadianPharmacy is one of very few online stores that sell generic medications only. Don't waste too much on what can cost less.
Caring for oneself is a natural quality of a human being. Don't get too risky buying medications from unlicensed Web pharmacies can be dangerous. If you want to save on your drugs try CanadianPharmacy. The prices in our discount Canadian drugstore will please you. CanadianPharmacy welcomes you.
CanadianPharmacy 100% safety at the lowest price you've ever seen. Only generic drugs on sale.
Sincerely yours,Neil Champagne
